meanings.sent1: The comedian shared a hilarious joco with the audience.
meanings.sent2: She couldn't resist sharing a joco with her friends during lunch.
meanings.sent3: The joco made everyone burst into laughter at the party.
meanings.sent4: His witty joco was like a ray of sunshine on a gloomy day.
meanings.sent5: The joco about the chicken crossing the road was unforgettable.

meanings.definition: Joco - characterized by humor or playfulness
meanings.sent1: Her joco personality always brightened up the room.
meanings.sent2: The playful puppy had a joco attitude towards everything.
meanings.sent3: The joco banter between the siblings was heartwarming.
meanings.sent4: The joco atmosphere at the party lifted everyone's spirits.
meanings.sent5: His joco nature made him a favorite among his colleagues.
